name: 口述歷史－方法與研究領域研討
description:
中文課程簡介: 
七〇年代重新發現了口述歷史作為歷史研究方法的價值。面對偏重結構與進展之社會史的大敘事，口述歷史不僅能作為補充，更進一步強調一般人的經驗、個人力量及主體性，這些面向逐漸讓口述歷史發展為一個獨立的研究領域。本課程將描述這個發展在經驗論與認識論層次的成果與意義。全英語課程!
goals: Guide students towards dealing with oral history as source material
Help students understand the specific quality of Oral History for historical research
Enable students to understand Oral History on an interdisciplinary level
Independently engage Oral History in a reflection on methodological or empirical issues
syllabus:
9/12    Introduction: Oral History within Historiography (Grele, Movement without aim)

9/19    The Oral History Interview Process (**Plato**, Guidelines; OHA; MSDP)

9/26    Ethics of Oral History (**Portelli**, Battle; Halbmayr, Ethics)

10/03   Oral History as a Genre (Portelli, Genre; **Thompson**, Voice)

10/10   停課

10/17   Dimension of Subjectivity in Oral History (**Passerini**, Work ideology OHR; Portelli, What makes)

10/24   Influence of Gender on Oral History (**Bertaux**/Malysheva, Countrywoman; Darian-Smith, Romance)

10/31   Oral History and Truth (Halbmayr, Truth; Roseman, Surviving \[**Marianne Ellenbogen**\])

11/07   Role of Silence in Oral History (Peltonen, Memories \[**Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn**\]; Gittins, Silences)

11/14   Oral History and Trauma (**Laub**, Not knowing; Klempner, Navigating)

11/21   Oral History in the Courtroom (Landsman, Eichmann Case \[**Rivka Yoselewska**\]; Knellessen, Witnesses)

11/28   Oral History under Dictatorial Rule (**Leydesdorff**, Silence; Scherbakowa, Gulag)

12/05   Re-Interviewing as Diachronic Oral History (**Greenspan**, Awakening; Laub, 25 years)

12/12   Case study: The International Forced Labourers‘ Documentation Project (Plato, Slavery \[**Anita Lasker-Wallfisch**\])

12/19   Oral History in a Cross-Cultural Setting (Kopijn, OH; **Thomson**, Moving stories)

12/26   Oral History as Part of Public Memory (Thomson, Anzac OHR \[**Fred Farral**\]; PMG, Popular memory)

1/02    Oral History in Moving Images (Lanzmann, Shoah \[**Franz Suchomel**\])

1/09    期末考

methodologies.note: Teacher will introduce the core content of each methodological/ empirical approach（可說明實施細節）
Each session will conclude with a time slot for concluding remarks from both teacher and students
Students will be encouraged to raise questions on both, content and language levels, and will have the chance to contribute to the solutions
Students will be working together on selected sources and documents

grading.note: Written exam about the core content of the course
Individual PPT on targeted assignments; the content of the presentation has to be handed in as a 2000 word written text in English within two weeks after the presentation!
